subject: Hockey, Ice
Pain-Relieving Drugs
Series
Sports Injuries
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Over six months, The Times examined the life and death of the hockey player Derek Boogaard. The second article of a three-part series explores the devastating toll of fighting on players.
snippet: Over six months, The Times examined the life and death of the hockey player Derek Boogaard. The second article of a three-part series explores the devastating toll of fighting on players.
